reviews.sentence: Very handy to most things. The rooms were very clean but could do with a bit of a spruce up as all looking a bit tired. Couch very uncomfortable and beds a bit hard. can not fault the location easy walk to casino shops restaurants etc. Staff very friendly and helpful. A very reasonable sort of hotel but if you are looking for something a little more luxurious you may want to go somewhere else. Recommend room on a high floor.

Hotel position very convenient. Issues resolved. I was a little disappointed this visit. I have stayed here many times and was always happy but this time I paid for an apartment and city view but was given a room with the lifts backing onto the room and the view was the building site across the road. The noise from the lifts during the night was like a jumbo jet going up and down and sledgehammers etc from the building site during the day. I requested a change after one night given we were staying for a week. We were given another room on a lower floor and told we could move again to a higher floor a couple of days later as they were fully booked. I had actually booked a couple of months ahead so I was disappointed. I was not happy to have to move and pack again so settled for that room. We were reimbursed for the charges for our breakfasts to compensate for not having what we paid for. I felt this was a satisfactory response so I was happy about the outcome. I like the convenient position of this hotel the staff helpful when we had an issue with the room. Close to transport. Close to city shopping across the road for trams and short walk to Southern Cross station. Updating of bathrooms and softer beds.

Convenient and clean. Nice hotel in a good location. A few blocks away from the shops of the Bourke St Mall and with the free tram system that is not a problem. An easy walk to the Crown Entertainment Complex. Was woken at 4 am by noise from people leaving a night club nearby Saturday night. so a room on a higher floor or at the front of the hotel would probably be better. However our studio apartment was huge so that made up for no view and a bit of noise Room 713.
Wonderful. Accommodation in great location with easy access to public transport. Would have preferred a separate shower as our shower was over the bath.
No room service available because it was Easter.
loved this place everything was great except the hotel spa did nt work properly and the shower did nt have great pressure. but for the price the hotel was great for the price.

Great location. Very good value. We had a great stay at Oaks on Market. The location is perfect and the staff very friendly. The only negative we encountered is that the room was not cleaned on one of the days but it was not an issue.

Good location. I like the location easy access to everywhere. Spacious bathroom but seems a little bit old. They gave me extra towel and toiletries. The pillows was not comfortable for us. I stayed for 4nights and they just gave me the room service menu on my last night. Very basic kitchen equipments and i really disapointed that there was only 30minutes free wifi per day.

Not what we expected from the Wotif description. When we arrived the carpet was ripped there was a large stain that looked like vomit. The room did not look like any of the advertised pictures with pillows etc we literally had one pillow each and had to ask for more. The fridge did not even have a bottle of water in it even though the ad said food and drink there was not even enough sugar packets to have an instant coffee. oh and the iron leaked everywhere as it was broken. We were unimpressed.

Good location and staff missing amenities. Oaks on Market is in a great location and the staff were extremely helpful on our stay. Unfortunately we had a west facing room on a very hot day and the airconditioner could not be fixed. Very distressing with crying hot baby in the room. portable air conditioner provided after 2 calls downstairs. Foxtel not working and staff unable to fix. Bit disappointing as room charge was not cheap for a studio apartment. Helpful staff location fix the ac fix the foxtel.

Down town apartment rooms handy to trams. A short free tram ride from Southern Cross statio ignore the directions at Bokingcom go up the escalators to the Collins St tram near the suburban train entrance. level access to the tram and the Wiliam St stop is 20 metres from the hotel. Very large room with basic kitchen. Big numbers of football fans and also school holiday families and conferences so the romantic hotel question above is a bit strange. Fast checkin and checkout. All good. A party somewhere in the building with dof dof music echoed through the building until 4 am Sunday. Not good for sleep.

Excellent. Great location fabulous spacious room great deal too easyIt came up as part of an Expedia deal but will happily stay there again whilst we did not eat in the hotel. Market St is off Collins St and every single Melbourne laneway is closeby it seems we had a favourite restaurant already selected but you are spoilt for choice in this location.
Great location good service new rooms. Would recommend.

Would definitely return and recommend to friends. Very good staff. Disappointing only 30 mins free wifi. Very convenient location. Can not rate food as did not eat. Immaculate room with excellent facilities. More free wifi.
Great Experience. Staff were friendly rooms were neat n spacious. Food was great.

wonderful hotel. the apartment we stayed in was on the top floor the views of Melbourne were fantastic the room was spotlessly clean very spacious the beds comfy ca nt find any fault at all with this hotel highly recommend it will always stay here when in Melbourne.

Excellent location and marvellous front desk staff. We stayed at this property for 3 nights as a family of 4 for leisure. The location is excellent being a 2minute walk to the tram stop and within the free tram zone. The Immigration and banking museums are a short walk away. Rooms and beds are comfortable. The buffet breakfast spread is modest but good. The best part of our stay were the marvellous front desk staff especially Andrew. He helped us with our car rental and the booking of our theatre tickets. He was patient polite and always had a smile no matter how difficult the process we had trouble with the theatre booking web site. He always greeted us when we returned and left the hotel. Overall a great stay. The only drawback is the bathroom instead of mixers the hot and cold water are controlled by separate taps which can be time consuming and a waste of water to adjust in cold weather. The hair conditioner can also be of better quality.

Great location family friendly excellent service. We had n’t stayed here previously but will definitely be staying here again our new ‘ go too ’ in Melbourne. room was spacious neat and tidy staff were excellent family friendly great location close to a tram stop and easy walking distance to Southbank.

Large bright and spotlessly clean rooms in an unbeatable location with friendly staff. The check in process could not have been easier. Room was much bigger than expected spotlessly clean and the buffet breakfast was fairly priced. The only tiny little improvement I can suggest is advising guests before arrival that they need to park around the corner walk up and have parking discount applied. We were a little confused about where to park. It was hardly an issue though.

Nice hotel. The hotel was very well positioned quite close to a lot of restaurants and shopping with easy access down to the river. The rooms were spacious and clean and there is a bar restaruant and place to get a quick breakfast and coffee in the morning. Quite a lot of construction nearby as there was a huge building going up opposite the hotel. Not a bad stay and value for money.
